Package it.polimi.ingsw.server.model

Interface Game

All Superinterfaces:
MessageListenerSubscriber
All Known Implementing Classes:
GameModel, GameModelExpert, GameModelTeams
public interface Game extends MessageListenerSubscriber
Game interface. It exposes the methods to change the state of the game.

    • moveStudentToHall

      boolean moveStudentToHall(int entranceIndex)
      Moves a student from the Entrance to the Hall of the current player.
      Parameters:
      entranceIndex - of the student that will be moved to the Hall.
      Returns:
      if the student was successfully moved to the hall.

    • moveStudentToIsland

      boolean moveStudentToIsland(int entranceIndex, int islandGroupIndex)
      Selects a student from the Entrance of the current Player's SchoolBoard, removes it from there and moves it to a selected island that is part of a selected IslandGroup.
      Parameters:
      entranceIndex - of the slot occupied by the student that will be moved.
      islandGroupIndex - of the IslandGroup that contains the selected island.
      Returns:
      if the student was moved successfully.

    • moveMotherNature

      boolean moveMotherNature(int num)
      Moves mother nature by num.
      Parameters:
      num - of moves that MotherNature should make.
      Returns:
      if the move ended successfully.

    • getStudentsFromCloud

      boolean getStudentsFromCloud(int cloudIndex)
      Moves the student currently residing on a cloud to the Entrance of the current Player.
      Parameters:
      cloudIndex - of the selected cloud.
      Returns:
      if the students were taken correctly from the cloud and added to the entrance.
